alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 21 at 8:57PM MST until August 21 at 10:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Southwestern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1000 PM MST. * At 857 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Blake Ranch Road to near Chloride, moving south at 40 mph. Kingman will be impacted imminently. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 20 and 79. Locations impacted include... Bullhead City, Kingman, Yucca, Wild Cow Campground, Dw Ranch Road, Chloride, Oatman, New Kingman-Butler, Blake Ranch Road, Hualapai Mountain Park, Golden Valley and Hualapai Peak. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
